attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a OAP and with the rise in Fuel bills not forgetting we in Devon are paying the highest water charges in the country added to this an enormous council tax bill which alone is three times more than I pay the Government in income tax. It is about time this council tax is frozen has seems the case in some parts of Scotland and now the promise from the Conservatives to do the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
